songs.title: Wahala
songs.lyrics: Soliye, Soli ye ye ye /nProblem e no dey finish, make you try dey enjoy oh/nWahala e no dey finish oh oh, make you try dey enjoy oh/nSay Katakata, wuruwuru e no dey finish, make you try dey enjoy/nProblem e no dey finish, make you try dey enjoy, oya now/nMake we dance like no wahala, eyyah no wahala oh/nMake we dance like no wahala, eyyah no wahala oh/n
